title: Puretrop Fruits Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 26.37 crore, up 33.35% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Puretrop Fruits are:Net Sales at Rs 26.37 crore in December 2025 up 33.35% from Rs. 19.78 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 2.71 crore in December 2025 up 260.42% from Rs. 1.69 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 4.76 crore in December 2025 up 249.69% from Rs. 3.18 crore in December 2024. Puretrop Fruits EPS has increased to Rs. 3.40 in December 2025 from Rs. 2.12 in December 2024. Puretrop Fruits shares closed at 173.50 on January 12, 2026 (BSE) and has given 39.30% returns over the last 6 months and 27.62% over the last 12 months.
